Banner.Description: I am a software engineer with over 5 years of experience, specialising in the development of technology solutions. I focus on writing and refactoring clean, reusable and scalable code in Angular and Spring Boot, applying best practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 5 years as a developer, I've sought to learn every day. I've worked on writing unit tests, solid principle,continuous integration, and covered backend developer roles with Spring Framework, Spring Boot, Kafka, Quarkus, VertX and MariaDB. I've already worked in a number of sectors, including telecoms, insurance and banking.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing codes, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer
Description: Development and maintenance of a server application that manages hardware, locations, monitoring, inventory, maintenance, supervision and logs, which improved user experience and performance.
Implementation of RESTful APIs to support multiple client requests, using Java and Spring boot, Spring Security and Hibernate
Implemented web accessibility and responsiveness across different screen sizes with Angular
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups
Performed a code review of pull requests to ensure code is 100% compliant to all standards
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer
Description: Develop a RESTful api using spring's restTemplate to retrieve data from the monExt api platform and display it using the Open API.
For development, we adopted the RED GREEN REFACTOR, starting with unit testing to ensure good coverage of the project.
Coding of API requests with Spring Framework.
Creation of modules with complex reactive forms
Improved website performance by optimizing codes and implementing caching techniques.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Wagering Device Management
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The WDM goal is to centrally maintain a fleet of devices deployed in POS (terminals and ticket checker) in working conditions and report a general health status that allows the wagering company to take quick and accurate corrective decision in case of problem.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: eDelubac
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: eDelubac is an application that allows customers to manage their banking transactions remotely, simply and securely.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: facture-ekwateur
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: RestFul API which calculates a customer's electricity consumption between 02 dates

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Gestion de Stock | Front
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Application to manage the stock of a product.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Gestion de Stock | Back
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Application to manage the stock of a product.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
